AEA.AEAText: Update: Authorities have confirmed a shooting incident occurred [approximate time] at [building/location]. Police are on the scene and investigating. A suspect is NOT in custody. If you are campus on follow lockdown procedures, go into the nearest room and lock doors. Persons not on campus are advised to stay away. Contact Campus Public Safety (Public Safety Campus phone number) if you see anything suspicious or have information. Wait for the all clear from officials or local authorities. For additional information and updates go to (Emergency Website) or stay tuned to (channel)
